name: Lakshmi
description:
लक्ष्मी lakṣmī
A Hindu goddess of wealth, prosperity (both material and spiritual), fortune, and the embodiment of beauty. She is said to bring good luck and is believed to protect her devotees from all kinds of misery and money-related sorrows. 

Printed on 100% pure silk. 50x50cm. Button Fasten. Insert not included.

name: Cherry Pagode Industrial Table Stand
description:
Inspired by the Japanese Cherry Blossom this collection is screen printed on cotton.

Technical sheet
• Stand in wood and rusted finish steel
• Fabric shade with exclusive screen printing design
• Export bulb holder and hand switch, moulded plug
• Total height: 59cm

Please contact us to make an order.

name: Botanic Leaf Tulip Table Stand
description:
The leaf of the “monstruosa deliciosa” which climbs the walls of our garden is the main form of inspiration here. We use a two colour print to accentuate the realism.

Technical sheet
• Stand in Pillai Maradu used for its strength and beauty - Available in natural or dark finish
• Fabric shade with exclusive screen printing design
• Export bulb holder and hand switch, moulded plug
•Total height: 67cm

Please contact us to make an order.

name: Bindaas Jhakass: Matchbox
description:
'Bindaas Jhakass' is an expression used around India. (From Marathi (Bin + Dhast = Without Fear, meaning 'relaxed'). Translated, this phrase means, Without fear, just do it!). 

This range is inspired by the streets of India; adorned with disparate juxtapositions of historic, mythological and contemporary visual culture. 

This funky range will brighten up your home. Mix it in with patterns or floral cushions that you already have to add an extra spice. 

Printed on 100% cotton. 30x40cm. Button fasten. Insert not included.

description:

name: Arabica
description:
The Arabica collection takes its name and inspiration from the ancient Eurasian decorative art of the Arabesque, usually screen printed in silver and gold on ivory cotton material.

description:

Printed on 100% pure silk. 50x50cm. Button Fasten.

name: Izmir Table Stand
description:
This collection draws its inspiration from nature; specifically the lotus flower. The organic shape of the Izmir coupled with the smoothness of the raw silk, makes it the perfect shade to light a dining or living area.

name: Hand Loomed Napkins
description:
These napkins are 22" square with mitered corners, large enough to use as place mats too. Beautiful motifs for your kitchen or dining room. 100% pure organic cotton and hand block printed with natural dyes. Available in various colours.

Holy Ash is an environmentally conscious and socially responsible company. These table throws are printed on cotton fabric in south India according to an age-old process that is altogether friendly to the environment. And because we bring fair trade employment to the communities where the work takes place, local culture is unaffected and continues to thrive.

name: Hand Loomed Throws
description:

And because we bring fair trade employment to the communities where the work takes place, local culture is unaffected and continues to thrive.
